00036 require_once('include.php');
00037 
00038 $Submenu= SetSubmenu('cpus');
00039 
00040 switch ($Submenu) {
00041     case 'cpus':
00042         $View->Layout= 'cpus';
00043         $View->GraphHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('If your system has a multi-core CPU or more than one CPU, you can run the SMP kernel. If this page does not display multiple graphs, one for each CPU, after you switch to the SMP kernel, go to system configuration pages, apply automatic configuration, and reinitialize graph files.');
00044         break;
00045 
00046     case 'sensors':
00047         $View->Layout= 'sensors';
00048         $View->GraphHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('This page displays the graphs of all temperature and fan sensors in your system. You may have multiple sensors depending on your hardware. Virtual machines may not provide any sensors at all.');
00049         break;
00050 
00051     case 'memory':
00052         $View->Layout= 'memory';
00053         $View->GraphHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('This page displays the graph for shared memory and swap area usage. If the swap area usage is too high, you may consider adding more RAM. For higher system performance, you want to have no swap usage at all.');
00054         break;
00055 
00056     case 'disks':
00057         $View->Layout= 'disks';
00058         $View->GraphHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('This page displays the I/O graphs of all the disks in your system.');
00059         break;
00060 
00061     case 'partitions':
00062         $View->Layout= 'partitions';
00063         $View->GraphHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('This page displays the usage graphs of all the partitions on your disks.');
00064         break;
00065 }
00066 
00067 require_once('../lib/graphs.php');
00068 ?>
